doc:
Richard Burgi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Burgi 0 Richard William Burgi (, born July 30, 1958) is an American film and television actor best known for the roles of Det. Jim Ellison on The Sentinel and as Karl Mayer on Desperate Housewives. Richard_William_Burgi ( , born July_30_,_1958 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor best_known for the_roles of Det._Jim_Ellison on The_Sentinel and as Karl_Mayer on Desperate_Housewives .
